title: Where can I find documentation for IDA Freeware?
content: I have looked at the official documentation page and it doesn't have an entry for IDA Freeware. Is it available at all? Is there a popular unofficial one? Do I just read the one for IDA Pro?

comments.text: Hi and welcome to RE.SE. You basically read the IDA Pro one and there are restrictions (target CPUs, loaders etc ...) which make it deviate from IDA Pro.
If you are not sure - How about pressing F1 while using IDA freeware? It has some doc though I don't know how much of it is relevant to you.
